title: Multiple Calls Causes Mic Issues
content:
When I am on a call; if I get a second incoming call, even if I decline the call, the first caller can not hear me anymore. I am still on the call with them but they cannot hear me. 

If I pick up the second call, they can hear me fine, the first caller just can't hear me.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
